law.catch_line: Condemnation for oil or gas pipelines and related facilities -- Petition.
law.text: A corporation, partnership or individual seeking to condemn lands and material or the use and occupation of lands, under the provisions of KRS 278.502, may file a verified petition in the office of the Circuit Court clerk of the county in which all or the greater portion of the land and material is located. The petition shall state that it is filed under the provisions of KRS 278.502 and shall be conducted pursuant to the Eminent Domain Act of Kentucky.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 127. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 186, sec. 2.
